programme.title: Lagos Life
programme.desc: Faith regrets having a son, she tries abandoning him but later finds a friend in the city that makes her sell him. Everything seems fine with her until his father shows up.

programme.title: Above Her Age
programme.desc: Faithful is determined to do everything to ensure her parents stay together forever. However, her hopes for happiness are shattered when she discovers a secret.

programme.title: The Mafia King
programme.desc: Two princes, both heirs to the throne engage in a fierce and unscrupulous battle to claim the throne after their fathers death.

programme.title: Devils Desire
programme.desc: Eric had a thing with his wifes friend Toki, now she tries to scheme her way into the house through all means possible.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Adanna rejects her suitor. Princess Ahunna tells Ejike why she refuses to marry him. Maduka says his farewell.

programme.title: Particles Of Jealousy
programme.desc: After a one-night stand, Prince Izunna falls in love with Bianca, but this love is short lived as Bianca is accused of cheating.

programme.title: For Better For Love
programme.desc: Hillary ends his relationship with Brenda because she tells him the truth about his parents, now in a relationship with Stella, he is about to have the biggest regret of his life.

programme.title: Untimed
programme.desc: Alfred starts up a family without telling his wife that he has a daughter Mmasi. Mmasi moved into his house but he has to keep this secret to himself or his house tears apart.

programme.title: In His Shoes
programme.desc: Uche lost all feelings for his wife Ebube after she gives birth to their baby girl. Their story is about to change as Uche losses his job.

programme.title: Discovery
programme.desc: A relentless womanizers world shatters when he suffers a stroke.The consequences of his infidelity takes an unforeseen turn when his wife gathered some information.

programme.title: The Love Battlefield
programme.desc: Mmesoma wants to marry so she can escape the quarrels from her parents at home. Will she find peace after she is married?

programme.title: Changing Times
programme.desc: Despite Uncle Godfreys advice to baby Kanife, his nephews wife, she decides to be stubborn despite her pregnancy, decision that might ruin something.

programme.title: Soul Ties
programme.desc: An eighteen-year-old girl struggles desperately to prove her innocence for the murder of her Pastor, but her brief romance with the Pastor now stands in her way to freedom.

programme.title: Making Omelettes
programme.desc: A busy father commits a financial crime at work and then pens down an emotional apology letter to his family whom he has neglected for so long to reveal unimaginable secrets.

programme.title: Akudo
programme.desc: Akudo does everything for Ikenta because his wife Mmachi decides to be a lazy woman.

programme.title: The Obdurate
programme.desc: Ijeoma is refuses all the rich suitors that comes for her hand in marriage, because her sisters manipulate her out of jealousy. Now she has placed a curse on them never to be happy.

programme.title: Visa On Arrival
programme.desc: Everything is not as it seems, and the Visa Officers are in for a real shock with this batch of applicants. It turns out they chose violence at the worst time

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: the tale of Dayo, a gullible but optimistic young man who moves to Lagos with dreams of making it big.

programme.title: The Rishantes
programme.desc: Matilda has her party members upset. Safari is getting impatient. Adi has an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Tinsel
programme.desc: The story follows the lives, rivalries, and relationships of two film production companies, exploring power, love, and betrayal.

programme.title: Riona
programme.desc: The palace gets a glimpse of the power of the stone. Atseaghan shows his father what kind of king he intends to be. Lovers are on the run as Tseye and Tsola come to a terrible clash.

programme.title: Forbidden
programme.desc: The secret affair between two lovers is exposed when the ladys colleague sends a picture of the couple making out to the blogs.

programme.title: Kintampo
programme.desc: A world-class news reporter at The Daily Heritage, finds her job threatened, and her chances of promotion slimmer than ever.

programme.title: Date My Family Nigeria
programme.desc: Reality dating show where suitor goes for dinner with 3 different families of potential dates and eventually picks one date, while the rejected dates are visited with a token.

programme.title: My Flatmates
programme.desc: Tejiri loses a good deal because of her incomplete company profile.

programme.title: Check Out
programme.desc: When Tomis dress breaks and they have a daddy daughter day, Tayo saves the day. Teddy and Eloghosa are at odds due to his kids dislike her. Chief Henshaw order Nengi.

programme.title: Visa On Arrival
programme.desc: We all need a break and traveling is sometimes the best escape. But now you dont have to worry about visa hassles, we have the best visa officers to help you on your way.

programme.title: Style Magnate
programme.desc: Designers embrace sustainability, crafting avant-garde eco-friendly looks. As models hit the runway, harsh judge critiques shake the competition, forcing one designer out.

programme.title: My Pregnancy
programme.desc: A young lady wakes up to a sudden pregnancy. A pregnancy that throws everyone in a state of confusion and suspicion when it turns out she has no idea how it came by.

programme.title: De9jaspirit Talent Hunt

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, And Dives

programme.title: The Kitchen

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Not many films rival the visual spectacle of Christopher Nolans sci-fi epic. Leonardo DiCaprio and a stellar cast enter peoples dreams to steal corporate secrets.

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: Expect carnage, explosions, gunfights, and car chases in this intense star-studded thriller. A shady art dealer crosses paths with a mob over a stolen iconic painting.

programme.title: Fear Of Rain
programme.desc: Harry Connick Jr and Katherine Heigl star in this psychological thriller. A schizophrenic teen believes that her neighbour has kidnapped a young girl, but no one believes her.

programme.title: Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Gary Oldman won the Oscar for his portrayal of iconic British Prime Minister Winston Churchill in this biopic. During WWII, he debates whether to negotiate with Hitler or fight on.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: Two Tails
programme.desc: A crazy, wacky, animated adventure. After becoming best friends, a beaver and a cat embark on a dangerous mission to save their friends who have been abducted by aliens.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: This adorable animation with an ensemble cast explores the world inside our phones, where emojis live and one multi-expressional emoji heads off on an adventure to discover his purpose.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A touching film. After rescuing a dolphin from a trap, a boy learns that the animals tail must be amputated, prompting him to convince a marine biologist to devise a solution.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Journey To The Center Of The Earth
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson (The Hunger Games) has an unforgettable adventure in this fantasy film about a boy and his uncle who take a thrilling trip beneath the earths surface.

programme.title: The Guilt Trip
programme.desc: The comedic chemistry between Seth Rogen and Barbra Streisand is the highlight of this film about an inventor nerd who impulsively invites his meddling mom on a road trip.

programme.title: Cradle 2 The Grave
programme.desc: Jet Li plays a Taiwanese intelligence officer who teams up with a thief for a rescue operation in this slick action crime thriller from the director of Romeo Must Die.

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: In this action movie, Aaron Eckhart takes on the criminal underworld. While investigating his partners murder, an LAPD K-9 officer uncovers a vast conspiracy.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: South Africas Neill Blomkamp directs Matt Damon in this gritty post-apocalyptic sci-fi film about last chances and sacrificing ones self for the greater good.

programme.title: Spiral From The Book Of Saw
programme.desc: This Saw spin-off adds a new twist while keeping the franchises brutality. Detective Zeke Banks (Chris Rock) tries to track down a Jigsaw copycat killer who targets cops.

programme.title: The Gates
programme.desc: A gripping supernatural thriller set in the 1890s. A serial killer sentenced to death puts a curse on the prison he is in and all of those in it before his execution.

programme.title: Nightmare Pageant Moms
programme.desc: A riveting thriller. A financially struggling mother and daughter enter a mother-daughter beauty pageant that could pay for her childs college. But things are not as they seem.

programme.title: Autumn In The City
programme.desc: An enjoyable romance film about Piper, who moves to New York City to find herself. There, she meets Austin, a jaded writer, and they discover the citys beauty together.

programme.title: My Sweet Monster
programme.desc: An animated musical for the family. Princess Barbara flees her wedding and meets a sweet monster and his pal, who help save her kingdom from an evil postman.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion Of The Cimarron
programme.desc: This Oscar nominee for Best Animated Feature film sees a young mustang stallion become the leader of his herd. But when he is captured, hes forced to fight for his freedom.

programme.title: Abominable
programme.desc: An exciting animated adventure. An encounter with a Yeti, targeted by a rich man, sets teenage Yi and her two friends on an adventure to return the magical creature to his home.

programme.title: The Secret Life Of Pets
programme.desc: When their owners are away, the pets play in this star-studded animation. Follow the life of a terrier whose jealousy of his new roommate leads them on a wild adventure.

programme.title: Bee Movie
programme.desc: Looking for a family film with a moral and Jerry Seinfelds observational humour? Then the story of Barry, the bee who leaves the hive for a big adventure, is just up your path.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Ashley Judd star in this sequel about friendship as a group of people in a marine hospital try and help a dolphin find a companion.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: An ensemble cast brings the legendary comic book league to life in this superhero movie. When Earth is attacked by an alien force, Batman recruits the help of the planets mightiest heroes.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Tom Cruise messes with forces unknown in this reboot. While trying to steal artefacts in the Middle East, a soldier accidentally awakens an ancient, malevolent princess.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sport meets romance in this Tom Cruise rom-com that showed us the money! A successful sports agent who loses everything is determined to get back what he once had.

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: A compelling survival thriller. When a horde of giant, hungry alligators infests a Louisiana police station during a massive hurricane, prisoners and guards must fight for their lives.

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopaths growing fascination with death.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, serving an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed - but this time its personal.

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Polar opposites Jamie, a womanizing pharma salesman and Maggie, a mysterious free spirit, find themselves taken by surprise when they fall victim to lifes ultimate drug: love

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: Samantha Mackenzie is hoping to experience life away from home and her parents as she leaves for college.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Emma Thompson plays Katherine Newbury, who is a legendary late-night talk show host, whose world is turned upside down when she hires her only female staff writer played by Kaling.

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean cut high school girl sees her life paralleling Hester Prynnes in The Scarlet Letter, which she is currently studying.

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Joneses
programme.desc: Go deep undercover in this action-comedy about a suburban couple who discovers their neighbors are covert spies embroiled in international espionage.

programme.title: Like Mike
programme.desc: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials MJ inside.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake and Amanda Seyfried star in this sci-fi thriller set in a future world where aging stops at 25, and the only way for one man to stay alive is to steal more time.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: An ex-killer for the mob, is kidnapped and injected with microscopic computers called nanites. They erase his brain and rebuild it for his body to be a weapon with superhuman strength.

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A young armored car guard is persuaded by his veteran cohorts to empty the truck of its $10 Million.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: When Lt. Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported to a new world, they engage in a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: Crunch Calhoun, a third rate motorcycle daredevil and semi-reformed art thief, agrees to get back into the con game and pull off just one more lucrative art theft with his brother.

programme.title: Mine
programme.desc: After an assassination attempt goes awry, an American soldier finds himself in a life-or-death struggle in the Afghan desert.

programme.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
programme.desc: Steve Carell plays a nice guy who has lived his whole life without doing it, but now his misguided pals are helping him to score and maybe even find true love.

programme.title: Knocked Up
programme.desc: They say that opposites attract, at least for one intoxicated evening, but several pregnancy tests later, Ben and Alison are lead on a funny and heart-warming journey in parenthood.

programme.title: Heath Ledger: A Tragic Tale
programme.desc: The tragedy of Heath Ledgers death has led to endless rumours and speculation about depression, hard-partying, and madness brought on by his role in the Dark Knight.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: The epic adventures of a man who discovers that he possesses the exhilarating ability to instantly teleport anywhere in the world he can imagine.

programme.title: Robin Williams: Laugh Until You Cry
programme.desc: The comic genius with an electric mind, with a range of talent that left us breathless. The one who amazed and kept us entertained until the very end.

programme.title: How Do You Know
programme.desc: How Do You Know, the new comedy written and directed by James L. Brooks that takes a contemporary and romantic look at the question, How do you know?

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for thousand years, shakes the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: When extraterrestrials arrive on Earth and threaten to wipe out the human race, its up to a handful of survivors, armed only with inferior technology, wits and courage to stop them.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: Twenty years after mysterious aliens nearly wiped out our planet, theyre back with a vengeance in this explosive sequel to the original blockbuster hit, Independence Day!

programme.title: Jumanji: Wamkelekil Ehlathini
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji.

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: LEGO Batman stars in his own big screen adventure. But if Batman wants to save the city from The Jokers hostile takeover, he may have to drop the lone vigilante thing.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Julia Roberts and Clive Owen star as two sexy spies-turned-corporate operatives who attempt to pull off one of the biggest heists ever.

programme.title: Sharknado 5: Global Swarming
programme.desc: With much of America lying in ruins, the rest of the world braces for a global sharknado, and Fin and his family must travel around the world to stop them.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: After his wife and family are killed, G Man Frank Castle takes it upon himself to rid America of crime by acting as judge, jury and executioner.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: After hunting down and killing hundreds of violent criminals, Frank Castle, aka The Punisher, faces his most deadly foe yet: Jigsaw.
